body:
Connect the analysis period to the UTCI recipe. I can't check exactly right now but this is what i do lately. I also noticed what you are saying about the analysisperiod not reflected in the rendered screen. I wonder if this is somehow related to this [issue](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/219#issuecomment-172735028) in the github?

I didn't check this thoroughly so didn't report until now. This is something that maybe Chris can answer more wisely.



As for the line ... idem.

-A.
